snippet.title: Ever Oasis - Demonstration - Nintendo E3 2017
snippet.description:
Check out the gameplay for Ever Oasis on the Nintendo Show floor at E3 2017.

The newest game from Koichi Ishii, the creator of the Mana series. The desert’s last safe haven is a lone oasis you call home. Draw a line in the sand and fight to protect it with the help of the water spirit Esna. Ever Oasis launches June 23, 2017.

Learn more about Ever Oasis! https://goo.gl/mYYV7e

Follow Nintendo E3 Coverage! http://e3.nintendo.com

#Nintendo3DS #EverOasis #E32017

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot
